title: Notifications & Alerts
summary: Comprehensive notification and alert system for system events and patient communications across multiple channels to ensure timely information delivery and improved engagement.
description:
Comprehensive notification and alert system for system events and patient communications across multiple channels to ensure timely information delivery and improved engagement. The system provides real-time alerts for critical clinical events, automated patient notifications for appointments and care activities, and system-wide announcements to keep all stakeholders informed and engaged.

## Technical Architecture Components

- Multi-channel notification service (SMS, email, push, WhatsApp)
- Alert routing and prioritization engine
- Template management system
- Delivery tracking and analytics
- Notification preference management
- Real-time event monitoring

## Implementation Timeline

**Week 1:**
- Notification service setup and channel integration

**Week 2:**
- Alert rules and routing configuration

**Week 3:**
- Patient notification templates and preferences

**Week 4:**
- Testing and delivery optimization

## Case Study Reference

**Community Health Center**

- **Challenge:** Low appointment show rates, missed critical alerts
- **Outcome:** 30% reduction in no-shows, 100% critical alert delivery rate
